Comments: This method is not called directly, but new PM_result objects are created using PM_load()
Alternative method to plot objects, e.g. PM_result$plot("op") = PM_result$op$plot() = plot(PM_result$op)
Alternative method to summarize objects, e.g. PM_result$summary("final") = PM_result$final$summary() = summary(PM_result$final)
Fit data using the model in the PM_result object
Calculate auc by supplying a src, e.g. PM_result$auc("op")
Simulate using the model in the PM_result object
Validate by simuation to create VPC or NPDE as a PM_valid object
Stepwise forward/backward linear regression between covariates and model parameter values
Optimal sampling to create a PM_opt object
